item.title: CVE-2024-32542|2024-04-17T08:27:37.910Z -- Organic Themes -- Bulk Block Converter
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Organic Themes Bulk Block Converter allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Bulk Block Converter: from n/a through 1.0.1.
